text:
@realDonaldTrump ...John Bolton, is out with a memoir of his time in the White House that suggests, among other things, that Trump sought the help of the Chinese president in his 2020 reelection race and seemingly approved of the use of concentration camps by China. 

https://t.co/T7QFOcscDo
